Interface Minigame

All Known Implementing Classes:
BrawlController, CaptureTheFlagController, CookingChaosController, ElectricEelController, KaboomersController, SnifferCaretakerController, TeleportersController

      Number playerLeave(org.bukkit.entity.Player player)
      Called when a player leaves the game
      Parameters:
      player - The player that left
      Returns:
      How long, if at all, until the game will call the stop method

      default List<MinigameFlag> getFlags()

      Returns:
      A list of all the MinigameFlag enums

    • getStarSources

      Map<StarSource,Integer> getStarSources()
      Called to get a map of all the star sources and how many stars they give, used internally for objective and win, and handled externally for kills

      A map of all the star sources and how many stars they give

    • dontReturnBlock

      default Boolean dontReturnBlock(org.bukkit.event.block.BlockPlaceEvent event)
      A condition if the block place event, when used with the unlimited block place event, should not give the block back
      Parameters:
      event - The BlockPlaceEvent from the event listener in MinigameListeners
      Returns:
      Whether to not give the block back, defaulting to false
